description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Among the Forest Trees, or, how the Bushman family got their homes. Being a book of facts and incidents of pioneer life in Upper Canada, arranged in the form of a story" Author: HILTS, Joseph Henry. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012622.f.18."
